item.description:
Time for another work out in the Fells.  Instead of heading to the gym, this trail run is aimed to get our heart rate going.  You should be able to jog at approx. 9:30min/mile to join this meet up.

 

This event is offered to both "Hike the Medford Fells" and the "Random Group of Hikers" with 4 spots for sign up for each group (for a total of 9 runners).  Please only sign up for this event once, even if you are a member of both meet up groups.

 

The plan is to run the Skyline trail (approx 7.5mi) in under 2hours.  Bring 2.5hours of your time with you in case we are slower due to the ground conditions.  We may be fast-paced walking as opposed to jogging in places.  The trail has plenty of rocks that may be slippery.

 

Bring something to drink (and possibly eat). To clarify: this is a workout, not a conversational meetup. Please do NOT sign up for this run if you are not planning on jogging the entire trail as it will slow down the entire group.  Along the same lines, please do not sign up for this meet up if you are a fast runner (e.g. 8min/mile split times) as you most likely will get frustrated with the 'slow' pace of the group--unless you are fine with running slower.  

 

To challenge yourself feel free to bring along your hiking backpack filled with winter hiking gear.  As we still don't have snow, this may be the only way our snowshoes will see the Fells this winter. :)

 

We will be leaving the parking lot at 10:05am and plan to return to the parking lot no later than 12:05pm.

 

No break scheduled during this loop run.  We are doing this as a group to help each other out whenever needed, keep each other on the correct trail ( :) ) and push each other to have a good workout. 

 

Looking forward to our run!

 

P.s.: Please note that the address may not be matching with the actual location of the Long Pond parking lot.  The parking lot is clearly labeled and located on the side of the Fells (and not across the street) on South Border Rd.

 

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; You agree not to hold the Organizer, Assistant Organizers, or any other members responsible for any injuries, mishaps, or any other situation that may happen at a planned event. You are responsible to research the event, know the area, and bring the proper gear.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be standing by the board next to the start of the trail.
item.name: Trail run in Middlesex Fells
